greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = sigma(7*n).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
example: For n = 3, the divisors of 3*7 are {1, 3, 7, 21}. Now, 1 + 3 + 7 + 21 = 32. So, a(3) = 32. - _Indranil Ghosh_, Feb 28 2017
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Feb 28 2017
